front.title: Preliminary Evaluation of RFC 1652 for Advancement to Full Standard

abstract.t: This memo is a preliminary evaluation of RFC 1652 "SMTP ServiceExtension for 8bit-MIMEtransport" for advancement from Draft to FullStandard. It has been prepared by the The Yet Another Mail WorkingGroup.THIS INTERNET DRAFT IS WRITTEN TO FACILITATE PROCESSING WITHIN THEIESG. IT IS NOT MEANT TO BE PUBLISHED AS AN RFC.
